title: Schema for dot dotgenerator.
description: Input data model for dotgenerator function block.

subgraphId.description: Optional subgraph ID. The dot filr will generate the grapg by usign this as root node.

path.description: Optional path where dot file will be stired. If not specified, it will store it relative to the file location, the SWM has been started.

dotFileName.description: Optional file name for the dot file to be stored. If not specified, it will generated based on a time stamp. <path>/<dotFileName.gv> will be the result.
